resources.string: Tokyo is the capital and largest city of Japan. It is a bustling metropolis known for its high-tech advancements, unique blend of traditional and modern culture, and delicious food. The city is home to over 13 million people and is a major center for business, finance, and transportation. It also has many tourist attractions, such as the Tokyo Tower, the Imperial Palace, and the Sensoji Temple. Additionally, Tokyo is also famous for its shopping and entertainment districts, such as Shinjuku and Shibuya.
